summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 3.2°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 24%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 16254 lux), cloud levels (up 760 m), and pressure (up 7 mbar).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), light levels (up 14429 lux), cloud levels (up 437 m), and outside temperature (up 3.0°C) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 397m and a high of 2140m, averaging 507.4m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and slight breezes. Drizzle or light rain possible, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and some sunny spells will occur. Changeable conditions.
